name: Impossible
description:
This is a quick reaction game.

The ball keeps moving forward.

You need to manipulate the ball to avoid impending obstacles.

When you avoid failure, the game will end.

Game gameplay

Keyboard: directional key manipulation

Game Features

A game that can be enjoyed as you please.

Unmatched operating experience, enjoying rhythm and speed

The dual test of hand speed and eye power, a classic and innovative operating mode.

Challenge yourself and let the ball run further!
